website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you want to give an electric blackhead removal tool a try. Once you learn how to use it and find the right setting for you, notable results are possible.
pros: Works with suction power to remove tough blackheads
Choose from 5 suction intensity levels to fit your needs
Rechargeable lithium battery lasts for multiple uses in between charges
Includes 4 replacement probes and a manual extractor tool
cons: Can leave red marks or bruises, especially on sensitive skin
Start with the lowest power setting to be on the safe side
May not work on all blackheads

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have very stubborn black heads, usually strips will let me down. Only using it once on the 3rd setting, it took so many out with no discomfort! I still have a few I need to work on, but I think this product rocks, and I'm excited to use the other heads soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very happy with this one compared to others that I have used before in the past. The battery life is incredible. The suction is good. I did learn the hard way however to not let it sit in one place for more than about a second especially on sensitive areas of skin like the neck. I have sensitive skin to begin with and I ended up with bruising that almost looked like a small hickey lol. I turned the suction down a notch and don't hold it in one place for very long more of a moving motion and haven't had that problem a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Effective and cost-friendly blackhead remover!
customer_reviews.text: This blackhead remover has been working very well for me so far! I had a bad breakout a couple of days ago. After using this product just a couple of times so far, my face has been clearing up quickly! I have always had a problem with large pores with whiteheads, so I’m excited to continue using this product and see the results!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction! Really works
customer_reviews.text: I really love how this product gets so much out of my pores. It makes my feel so clean after using it. Your face does stay red for a bit after using it but if you put a cool mask on it it will go away fairly quickly. I recently purchased this product but so far am very happy with it. Make sure you don’t leave it in one spot too long or you will bruise sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Directions easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Got some gunk out of my nose for sure! I'm going to order the face steamer and try it again with my pores properly opened. It didn't leave any bruising at all and I'm pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine White

customer_reviews.title: I’m super excited!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and tried it on my hand the suction power is very impressive! I’m so excited to try this. I love the box and organization they used for it too so it’ll be easy to keep clean. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chernet

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product 4 times now, 2x per week, and can already see a considerable difference in the cleanliness and size of the pores on my face. I take a hot shower before using and am also using daily toner. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but it definitely gets the job done. I have very stubborn blackheads and I end up damaging the skin rather than getting them out most of the time. I started with the first level of suction to try it out and was amazed at how much junk it managed to pull out of my nose. The suction is surprisingly strong even on the first level. I'd definitely be careful with using it your first time so you don't end up with any bruising.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Daye

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Ouch.. is the first thing I have to say for this black dot remover. I used this in the lowest setting to start, and it left my face feeling raw and sore. Also, a lot of my pores start to bleed a little bit. Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: xiangchun

customer_reviews.title: Skin damage
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal mask would work way better than using this, it irritates your skin and leaves hickey like marks all over your face. If used on cheek area a red mark will appear staying there for at least 9 hours. The suction power is far too great to the point it brings forth pain as you attempt to move the suction. Using on chin area or parts where there aren’t much meat will definitely leave hickey marks. Over all if you’d like to have a pretty messed up face this might be your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Roark

customer_reviews.title: i love this!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this blackhead remover and try it, it works much better than I thought. the socking power is good easy to clean good grip and size. I strongly recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: Chang K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: It had such a weak suction power. It doesn't suck anything while a slight squeeze with my fingers came out of a big white dot like nothing and doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Den Lin

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying!
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well and is easy to use. First time using it I saw instant results, and I was on the lowest setting. I also like the USB charging, makes it convenient and fast. It’s been used twice and the battery life is still good. I am not disappointed, highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience. I have sensitive skin and with acne I ordered this as i saw good reviews about it. Even i talked to the customer care before buying it as i wanted to confirm if it is safe to use on a sensitive skin. They told me its a good product for sensitive skin too and so i ordered it. First time use left marks all over my skin. It sucked my skin so bad that the marks are still visible eveb after a week. It may be a good product for normal skin but definitely not for a sensitive one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this...
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing. This thing is FANTASTIC. I have awful adult chronic acne, and this was a life saver. No face hickies if you use it properly. Fun and it works and makes you feel so good. Like the rest of the reviews, yeah, this thing didn't last very long before it kicked the bucket. In the beginning, you could go a whole week without charging, then a few days, until it just wouldn't charge altogether. I tried really hard to keep it from getting wet. Tldr: works great until it doesn't. Edit: the seller was very sweet and offered me a replacement / refund and was very very kind. Again, this product was great, just a little defunct.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I’ve done the microdermabrasion before and this just just about the same thing in the convenience of my own home! Love love it
customer_reviews.author: Stardust254

customer_reviews.title: Does what is advertises. AS LONG AS YOU FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions and make sure to not leave the suction on for more than 3 seconds, to start at the lowest setting, and to open your pores first with steam I am sure you will be just as happy as me! I love this. It is quicker and less damaging to my skin than picking at blackheads. I would definitely recommend it! If you do not follow the instructions then you likely will have a bad experience with the bruises and such. But I am super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Brady

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide any cleaning power for blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pore vacuum cleaner after I had used one of a different brand a friend had hoping it would work the same. I was disappointed to find out that the lonove does not have very much suction at all (would barely work even after a hot shower), but the handle was also bent at an odd position so it was difficult to hold and place on the face. If you happen to successfully pull up any material out of your skin with the device, it is also very difficult to actually get clean, and I felt as if I was putting a dirty tip to my skin every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Dunphy

customer_reviews.title: Use the tools and open pores first... duh.
customer_reviews.text: If you get one of these make sure you get the tools with it. You can't expect anything to pull out all the oil without opening pores... unless you want to look like the angry reviewers. It does a great job for price. Just don't be an idiot and go full suction... Charge holds well Materials are sturdy Washes out as easy as one of these can Comes with great accessory pieces I use my about once or twice a month and no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was the great packaging they have. Has an instruction manual so that is very helpful. The suction was actually a lot stronger than I expected and the device it’s self is really user friendly, didn’t have to read anything to figure out how to turn it on and replace the heads. Definitely recommend steaming your face for about 10 minutes first, it makes a pretty big difference. Excited to keep using this!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Getting Worse on face
customer_reviews.text: Everything works good after I opened the box. The suction power is fine, also it is very easy to use.But I still have to give one star! The reason is after I used the machine on pore, it will leave little blood holes or dots on my face. After few days later, it comes back and made my skin not smooth. Specially my nose part turns red all the time. I am not sure what’s going on, but I definitely don’t want to be a clown with red nose on my face after using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: mercyprayer

customer_reviews.title: Must have if u have skin
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! I have been getting schmancy facials since I was 12 (I know I am a monster) I’ve had stubborn black heads stuck on my chin and around my lips and nose that have never gone away. In 2 minutes they where gone! I also get blackheads in my ears that make wearing earrings uncomfortable. They are also pretty impossible to get on my own. Not anymore!! Also my 4 year old is prone to clogged pores but I feel weird popping her white heads since it feels a little toddlers and tiaras. This is still weird but she thinks it’s goofy and it gets her sweet little face free of pretty legit white heads. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Soooo many amazon boxes

customer_reviews.title: suction is strong
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are very clear that you should not leave the suction on for longer than three seconds and to make one-directional movements. I steamed my face for at least 10 minutes before using this device and felt that while it did seem to pick some slough up, it wasn't magic. I needed to go back over with the metal tools provided for complete extraction. But hey, if they didn't know that, they wouldn't have included that in their directions and included tools for extraction (nice). I was expecting more grime in the plastic head. As far as the suction goes, it will give you a hickey. The machine itself is definitely cool.
customer_reviews.author: piles.n.smiles

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Just not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I believe this was a good product. It just simply was not for me. I was searching for products that could be a part of my daily routine; however, this was not one of those products. It did seem to be a good product and I am sure there are people who could have found it useful. However, I was not one of those people. The product does give instructions and cautions. If you purchase the product, make sure you pay attention to those. For example, the product did warn that bruising could have been caused. That did happen to me when I used it. So definitely use the product with caution.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: doesnt really work?
customer_reviews.text: its easy to use but it didnt really work on me but it did to my girlfriend. i dont know if its the skin i have but it didnt really work for me all it would do was leave my skin red. it worked on my girlfriend but it left small bruises on her nose. i dont think i would really recommend. you could probably find something better somewhere else. i only liked the tools it has those worked well but the actual machine wasnt all that good. at all..
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. I use the oval head to promote blood circulation and increase skin elasticity of the skin. I am 61 years old so I need help in this area. Then I use the Cold Ball suction facial lifting head which helps sooth the face and reduce any swelling. I love It.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lola Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Blackheads be-gone
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how disgusting my face was until I used this. I have oily skin and always get black and white heads. I constantly do masks and those pore strips and still can’t control it. I used this tonight and the amount of stuff it pulled out of my pores was insane! It was super easy to use and I already have results! I can’t wait to see how my skin looks in a few weeks. If you have blackheads that have made a residence in your skin, you need this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V.

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUUUUCKS ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This thing is GOLD. $30 well spent!! I have bad blackheads and comedones and this thing has helped tremendously. My skin hasn’t felt this smooth in 10 years. Not to mention my makeup has been smoother too 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Jessie jones

customer_reviews.title: It really works, buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions on the manual or your skin will be suffer the consequences!!!! I steamed my face as directed and extracted after. I used the lowest setting as recommended. I was able to extract some stubborn whiteheads on my chin I've been trying to remove since forever, woohoo!! I didn't have bad blackheads on my nose but did have a few. Those are no longer existing. I also love the extract kit that comes with it: I used the little poke thingy on the ones I thought needed some more opening BEFORE I started suctioning. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs O

customer_reviews.title: GROSS! (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to use this! Where has this been all my life?? I was sceptical and unsure, but I'm a believer now. This is amazing! Different "heads" for different use. And 5 different suction levels. The instructions state to start at the lowest setting first, and there's a REASON for that! This has a lot of power. Make sure you have a q tip ready to clean it when you are done. If you're on the fence, buy it! Buy it now! I've used all sorts of lotions, potions, exfoliants, strips, masks (even the dreaded charcoal masks that "hurt") NOTHING has done as well as this.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, for so long I was holding off on buying one of these. So glad I finally pulled the trigger! Well worth the price, and works very well. I used a steamer before to open up my pores, and made swiping motions as instructed. I barely used the highest setting at all, as it is super super strong. Don't hold it on one area for a while or you can give yourself a bruise. I almost gagged at how much stuff came out of my pores! Would recommend it for someone who suffers from blackheads or clogged pores. If you are someone with cystic acne I would be careful as you don't want to spread bacteria over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. It isn't as visually satisfying as I was expecting, I thought I would see lots of gross stuff come out which is not the case. It's mostly dead skin for me. My boyfriend who has much larger pores than me does get a good amount of stuff out when using it. But I still love the effects I get, especially if I remember to use it multiple times a week. My favorite part are the metal tools it comes with. The loop sided tool is great for getting the curves of your nose!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me on the first try
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me on the first try. I tried this after steaming, suction seems good, but nothing came out. Will give it another try before returning. Full disclosure- I was offered a different product for writing a review, however the experience is my own.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: it is really great, after my shower ( and I don't like very hot water.) I tried it on my nose, it sucsion quite a bit of the accumulation of porous sebaceous, makeup and dirt, that even if you have an excellent regime for your face, will stay in them, I'm very pleased, the charge last a very good time, I highly recommend it. Also , I'd purchased a face steamer and the duo is FANTASTIC. 💌🌺
customer_reviews.author: Ce Ce

customer_reviews.title: Bruise face what is what they call me
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying this for two weeks now and even though I do get bruises every time because it is so powerful, if you take the proper precaution and follow what it says on the instructions then the bruising goes away in 1-2 days. I would suggest starting in the first level even though you don’t think you have sensitive skin. Trust me. Anyway I have used this with a face steamer which is recommended and It does suck out so much out of my face. It’s pretty satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Janetoss

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction and quick results
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you use on low setting at first when learning to use, especially for sensitive skin. This little machine is great, it has very good suction when used properly. Be careful to not overdue an area which is easy when you start to see the results. The red/bruise looking went away overnight and I think it was because I spent too much time in one area. Make sure you read the instructions on which head to use where. This is the great addition to your skin routine each week. A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Mama

customer_reviews.title: This works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is strong so DO be careful. There is a small learning curve but the first time I used it I could SEE all the 'gunk' it sucked out of the sebaceous glands. DO START ON THE LOWEST SETTING like they say. The little comedo kit they sent with it is a nice little addition. Don't make fun of their English. It's a bit strange but the product way out weighs a few mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend read through the directions. I know people just toss them in the junk drawer in their kitchen or immediately into the garbage. But this is your skin, your face we are talking about here and you don’t want to end up with a bruise like I did. I do believe it will be a trial and error relationship with this product until I get the full swing of it. But I am certain this will really help my skin. Just don’t give up on it the first time you use it. Make sure you read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I would give the vacuum a 1/5. Clearly it was sucking some oil out of my skin, which is probably a good thing. But when you get into the nitty gritty of is this device actually removing or reducing my clogged pores, my answer was fortunately no. I tested each head of the suction power, it was absolutely as hardcore as my skin could take, I have no idea if this is just a personal problem and I have exceptional thin skin or something like that, but I truely couldn't use the vacuum on my forehead, cheek, or chin without developing a bruise. In my case, this meant doing pretty much nothing.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device as a gift for my girl in December, and she loved it. Great for blackhead removal after a hot shower. But after she charged it last night- it has stopped working. Turns on, no suction, and the battery level seems to fluctuate with the increase of suction power (again, without any suction happening) for it’s price point, I would have been ok if it had broke after a year. To summarize: Works great until it breaks in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! But potentially too much.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made. It works very well, it's easy to use and clean. However, I wouldn't put it in the hands of an untrained unsupervised teenager and I feel like a tutorial on how to use it properly without damaging the skin would be much necessary. It works so well that can give addiction and easily become dangerous. Also, the power, at level 1, is already great, but the buttons are very sensitive and often times I accidentally pushed them while using it, which could be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: nancy crupi

customer_reviews.title: No longer skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly very skeptical. I bought this for myself to "test" before buying one for my teenage daughters for Christmas. I expected it not to work, for there to be little-to-no suction power, and for it to just be an all around cheap beauty product. I am definitely surprised! It works so well, and is so powerful! Nice packaging and product feels heavy duty. Very easy to use, with simple button controls and a thorough instruction manual. Also included a nice surprise of blackhead tools and different suction heads (and a roller ball) for various applications. Will purchase for my daughters as well.
customer_reviews.author: S Riddle

customer_reviews.title: It's been a month and it's already not working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself for mothers day, since it's something I wanted and my family was not able to go out to purchase me anything amid COVID19 shutdowns in May. I received it on May 31st. It was pretty decent while it worked for the price, but today on July 1st 2020, it stopped working as i was using it. The motor and suction stopped working, despite a fully charged battery. Turned it off and then turned it back on. Still nothing. The motor now will not function. It wasn't wet, I've not gotten it wet, I've kept it clean and have taken care of the battery properly. Seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! it does an amazing job and it even comes with some acne tools. I have oily skin, especially the buildup around my nose. Squeezing and acne tools hurt and strips didn’t do the job. This product works wonders! It is disgusting how much I get out of my worst areas! See the pics of what I got just out of my nose alone! Heads up, you have to keep dragging when it connects with your skin, don’t stop in one spot. This thing is powerful and can leave a mark on higher settings. It works so well. Different heads included for different purposes and the battery last for ever!
customer_reviews.author: A. Baali

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions and you'll see great results!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my wishlist for quite some time as I was undecided. The other day I complimented my friend for having such smooth skin and they told me they were using this product! That made up my mind and I ordered it right away. I used it a few times and can understand how people could get excited about using the most powerful setting as soon as they get it, but follow the instructions provided (steaming your face, and trying the less powerful settings first) and you'll see great results in a matter of weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo N.

customer_reviews.title: ADD TO CART NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! If you are like me and suffer from gross blackheads constantly you need this in your life. I am constantly in the mirror with my fingers pulling out black heads but this vacuum got everything out for me. I used it like the directions said, it was painless and effective. By the end of doing my entire face so much gunk came out, my face feels so clean and clear. I can't wait to use this twice a week like it says a post an update! Thank you so much for this product it is the best thing I've done for my face in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🤯🤯🤯🤯🤯🤯 AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Omgggg this thing is AMAZING! I had just exfoliated and cleansed my skin before I used it the 1st time and the gunk it sucked out of my skin was mind-boggling! It has incredible suction...of the 4 suction settings, I can only use levels 1 & 2. PLEASE read the instructions before you use this thing! It can and will damage your skin with improper use! I would not reccomend this product to someone with sensitive skin due to how powerful the suction is.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Fowler

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Day one and it made a bigggg difference. I’ve had the hardest time clearing my pores. I’ve tried it all even professional facials. No bruising as some claim BUT I got one spot i didn’t move the product quick enough and got a little hickey haha. So just Remember since it suctions, don’t just leave it on one area. Move it around slowly. I think this product is great! It cleared areas I’ve struggled with for so long.
customer_reviews.author: tom brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the directions it was easy to use. It’s a usb charger so it’s easily accessible to charge. I like how it came with different type of suction heads depending on what you’re trying to accomplish. After putting warm water over my face to open pores up, I used the whitehead remover and it started to come out. Be mindful of placing the suction GENTLY only for a few seconds. Also I have sensitive skin so I use the setting level 1-2.
customer_reviews.author: Maylene

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Follow directions, give it time.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, but yes it does leave marks. I suggest to follow the directions, use the lowest setting, do it every 3 days and do not go over the same area more than 2 times. I've been using it for 2 months and I always do it after taking a steamy shower and it works great! With time it leaves less and less marks too. Hope this helps :)
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Wow better then expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I been thinking about getting something like this for a while....now that I finally got it ! I love it !!! It really cleans your pores .... FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS and u will be fine I only used level 3!!! And it worked amazingly this little thing is STRONG! I used many things in the past to clean my blackheads! And nothing really work as good I am very happy with my purchase 😉
customer_reviews.author: janeth i

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction, start with level 1
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful suction, my whole t-zone where my pores are most visible and dark are left a little sore like I had just done a biore strip. Bumped it up to a level 2 (out of 5 levels of suction!) and it really cleaned up my cheeks and next to my eyes, but I may be red there for the rest of the day or tomorrow. I would recommend this, as it really does work- but suggest you time using it when you have a day or two off to recover, and definitely start off on the lowest setting before trying harder.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Banks

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye pores
customer_reviews.text: I never received directions on how to properly clean my vacuum or what certain items are for... but it definitely cleans your pores out! I felt soooooo smooth and flawless after using it just once! The suctions is strong and I would recommend not to go over the same spot too many times or it’ll make your face red. I’m a licensed esthetician and for me this was like mind blowing on how clean it can get the pores on your nose!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE ON DELICATE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the suction power on this is too strong for average users. It is only safe to use around the nose area for blackheads, as soon as you get close to the thinner eye area you run the risk of damaging blood vessels and stretching out the skin. Using on the lowest setting after getting out of a hot steamy shower, and making sure not to hold in one spot greater than 1
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product a lot, at first I thought it would’ve been really crappy since a lot of the reviews are horrible, but it works like magic! I bout it to use on my boyfriends nose and cheeks because he gets blackheads super bad and they make his pores huge! But, that being said this worked like magic! His blackheads have cleared up after 3 uses! It works like magic and I definitely would rate this product a 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Have used it twice. I cannot believe the gunk on my face that came out and I use a cleanser and a toner every 2 days!!! Would definitely start of with the least power suction cup. I started with the most powerful one and my skin was slightly red after using it(which is to be expected)but disappeared after a couple of hrs. Will definitely be using at least one or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with acne, blackheads and whiteheads since I was a teenager.. I used different products and different kinds of remedies to help me get rid of it, but nothing really worked to help me clear up my blackheads. Finally, when I came across this product I did not think twice to buy it, this product is similar to the ones on derma spas i've been to, and it always had this clear smooth looking result on my face! Device is easy to use, and it worked really well! I ended up buying 2 more for my sisters as a Christmas gift and they LOVE IT! MONEY WELL SPENT!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Super Product!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! I have to admit, I was skeptic to order this pore vaccum. I chose it over many others because of the price and its many features. I am so pleased with the product! The vaccum top power is amazing! It really cleans your pores. I like that you can recharge the element easily, it has four different heads for various areas on your face and purposes, and it is in atractive packaging. It would make a great, affordable gift for your teenager for sure! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Really good auction and results. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried all the attachments, but the auction power is really good. I use it on the second highest setting and get plenty of results using it on my nose. Easier and cheaper alternative than constantly buying pore strips. Make sure to use hot cloth to open pores and wash face prior to use. Also like videos show on YouTube, don't leave in one spot too long or you get the hicky effect.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had never imagined that such a thing existed. Watched a few videos & had to see for myself. This pore vacuum sucks out blackheads, pimples, and things you didn't even know were there. The range of settings are ideal: 2 is gentle enough for my husband, and the full 5 does me right. The variety of probes are ideal for different situations. Move quickly, or you will get hickeys. Definitely recommending to family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Finally A Device With Strong Suction To Get The Job Done!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the extractor!! I have purchased two of these from different makers. They were more expensive also.. They both turned out to be big flops. After reading the reviews on the Lonove, I decided to give it just one more shot...because a blackhead suction device concept is just great and makes so much sense to me. Well, welcome to the "Lonove!!" The suction is fantastically strong and just what was lacking with the other 2 suction devices I purchased. I am a happy camper now!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOVVVEEEE this
customer_reviews.text: Do it right after you get out of a hot shower and your pores are open and you will be surprised how much junk comes out! I have very sensitive skin and it worked great for me! I only bruised once because I used the highest strength multiple times in the same place. This is such a great things and my face feels amazing using this!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bruised My Face From Suction
customer_reviews.text: Used it this morning (it did not remove any white or black heads) and in the afternoon realized that my face had bruises where I’d used it. I did use the highest setting but that was because it wasn’t working on the other settings. Now I have these bruises AND STILL have clogged pores. I will be calling customer service and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on my husband and myself with suction power 2 after hot toweling our faces. followed instructions on the user guide. He has a slightly purple nose now and I'm totally fine. He has sensitive skin. So use with care if you have sensitive skin. Didn't have a lot of gunk to pull out but it did a good job with what we had.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Today was my first time using it. I am in love! I did not realize how disgusting my pores were until I used this. If you are skeptical of buying this I’m here to tell you, just buy it! I have adult acne and I know it’s because my dead skin cells and clogged pores. At first the suction was intense but I got the hang of it. Little areas at a time with light strokes. My skin texture feels sooooo smooth. I washed my face and did a mask afterwards and holy moly. I am so so impressed. I cannot wait to continue using this and see its long term effects on lessening my break outs
customer_reviews.author: yeena

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I would always try and get my white heads out of my nose and chin area with a Bobby pin, but this tool is life changing! Please make sure you use a steamer or blackhead lifter before use for better results. As soon as I finished steaming my face, I used this tool and got all the nasty junk from my pores. I was a little nervous about bruising from the suction power, but I didn’t get any long lasting redness and I used it on the highest power. I plan to use this weekly and add it to my facial routine, so I’m hoping I can see results within the next few weeks. I highly recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a quick at home treatment
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed an immediate improvement for the blackheads on my nose. However, I'm not able to use it long or my skin gets irritated. Since most skin products irritate my face (especially masks, scrubs, and peels), I'm happy to find something to smooth out my skin and reduce pore size. I use the suction on 2 or 3 and if you have sensitive skin, definitely don't go over the same places multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlita

customer_reviews.title: Zero Suction
customer_reviews.text: Received item but didn't get a chance to try it before return window closed. Item was defective, absolutely 0 suction. Contacted via email listed in box for assistance 2x and never received a response. $30 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendy

customer_reviews.title: Easily gets rid of so much gunk even after first use!
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate how user-friendly the device is. I was originally using the Biore pore strips, but they would show some improvement but little to none. My first use of this device, the pores on my nose was significantly smaller. My sisters even noticed and were amazed. Although, just a caution, I don't bruise too easily. I had the settings on 2 but just going back and forth for about 5 seconds or so will definitely bruise you. So just make sure you know your limit!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about purchasing one of these because I was fearful of the suction leaving hickey marks on my face. This one was my first purchase and it was great!! I followed the instructions about not holding it in one place for too long and I have had no issues with it leaving marks. The variation in suction is great and it gets the job done for sure. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Just try it out!!! It's worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have large pores to begin with and sensitive skin so I was skeptical...buy then I got it and had to try it out, boy was I surprised! The suction is very powerful, I only used the first setting and got a good amount of gunk out of my pores. I'm sure it will be even better when I get out of a hot shower, I only used a hot towel. The additional tool kit is a nice bonus. The item was packaged nicely and arrived very fast. I didn't leave it in one spot for very long and just kept moving it down as I went. I don't have any bruising and the redness is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim but am glad that I did. I am amazed at the gunk it pulls out of my pores. There is a learning curve to using it without leaving redness on your skin but if you follow the instructions you should be fine. The reason for only four stars: I wish that there had been better cleaning instructions included (the filter...are you supposed to clean the tiny filter? How often are you supposed to change it? Where can you purchase more tiny filters?)
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Great suction and i see build-up coming out. Have to do a little more work for current blackheads but those eventually have come out too! If I go a few days more comes out. I fully recommend and have even gotten my friends to try it. Works best on nose and chin. Have even seen results with body acne!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a pore vacuum before and was skeptical when I bought this one even though I read so many reviews. However, I followed the suggestions of steaming my face for 5 minutes before using this vacuum and I was SHOCKED by what came out of my pores! It definitely takes some getting used to and adjusting the suction power according to what region you're going over. I really loved the roller ball attachment as it has helped the bruising. I also follow the suggestion of putting ice on your face after use and that has helped as well. I'm very happy with this product and have noticed my pores getting smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I rarely write reviews on products, but this one deserves it. I had some stubborn small blackheads around my nose area and this product pulled everything out (ensure that you steam your face for the best results). also i had a few large pimples and this suction sucked out all the nasty stuff (to avoid a hickey like bruising Ensure that you don't keep it at the same spot for long periods. Keep it moving).
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is spot on. I would NOT recommend for Sensitive skin. I can use it on my face but never at anything higher then 2 of the 5 bars. 5 is nice if u have any black heads/zits or pimples on your body. Very easy to use. Easy to charge. Comes fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Good cleansing of pores, doing it gently and safely, without damaging the skin, relieves acne, pimples, improves facial color and appearance.The first time, the effect will not be noticeable. You should use this device twice a week on a well vaporized face. Right after use there is a pleasant feeling of purity and freshness on the face. Due to its compactness and the fact that it runs on rechargeable, it is convenient to take with you to the bath, sauna. Cons: The result is not immediately visible
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Add to Facial Routine
customer_reviews.text: After watching a few youtube videos on reviews and how to I decided to order this facial blackhead remover. Oh boy it did not disappoint! It works really well. I only needed to stay on the 1st level because it is very strong. It's satisfying to see all of the gross gunk come out of your skin (who knows how long its been there for ew!). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vasile

customer_reviews.title: No more clogged pores
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My fiancé has white heads on his his nose that I can’t really get out without him breaking out, so when I used this product and saw everything being sucked out I was amazed. My son had a few black heads that it sucked out as well. Definitely read the instructions because you can’t leave it long in the same spot. Luckily I read the reviews and knew this ahead of time. But will highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Savi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This would be perfect for someone with a "strawberry nose" or an oily nose. Make sure to steam the face first to open up those pores! The only issue i have is the suction is slightly uncomfortabe overall on the face for acne/blackheads. I have very stubborn blackheads on the cheeks and it did not help. Overall the product is great though. If you have alot of blackheads on your nose (especially having to wear these masks) this will work wonders for you. Its easy to use and understand. The box is nice to store it in when not in use, and with the option of suction power, it can be used on sensitive skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Better than a spa facial
customer_reviews.text: This at home blackhead remover is better than a regular facial at the spa and is fraction of the cost. I was able to use this all over my entire face. It comes with 4 nozzles and instructions on which nozzle you should use . It gets rids of blackheads and whiteheads and even has a nozzle to help reduce fine lines and and wrinkles over time. I personally have a oily face and after steaming my face and then using this product, I looked different. My face was so clean. I even FaceTimed my mom and she noticed immediately. She is like what did you do, your skin looks sooo good. I very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my product today and I was very eager to try it! Let’s just say I was not disappointed! I get little white heads on my “t” zone and this blackhead remover took all of that away! I used the larger head at the second/third suction level and it worked great! My skin feels very soft! Once done my skin was red but the redness went away in an hour or so. I am very pleased and this will be a regular tool in my skin routine!!
customer_reviews.author: faith Howard

customer_reviews.title: Wow it works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried first on his nose, lots of gunk removed! I would head warning to start at lower suctioning, I believe after 2-4 weeks there will be a great improvement in our skin. Better than chemicals or harsh scrubs. Update 12/2 noticeable difference in my skin, much smoother and less coming out of my pores. I really love this vacuum, I may be addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-fan

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: So I have gone to get microderm abrasions and the spa and this has the same suction power that the professional grade has. My husband and I both use this. It works best after the shower when your pores are open. We use it about 2 times and it has made a huge difference in blackheads! How did I go so long without this?!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: At first instructions are very simple to read and understand, but following them I realized the product does not replace a real facial work that you usually get at your derms office. Instead, left me with great bruises that took like 4 days to disappear and I could still see my pores with the clogs. After that I haven't tried again as I'm looking for other sources and blogs tips, to know how to relax my pores even more without pinching them, so the suction can be effective without harming. For a home tool from every now and then, maybe could be good, but this do not replace facials from your dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works so much better than those charcoal peel masks. This definitely cleans your pores much better. Just be careful using it on sensitive areas of your face because it will leave red suction marks and break the blood vessels in your skin. I only use it on my chin and nose.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove blackheads at all
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this product has really high suction, but it didn’t actually remove anything from my pores. I have used it over the last week every time I just get out of the shower, and basically all it does is remove excess dead skin on top of my skin. It doesn’t remove blackheads like it claims. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum Cleaner - LONOVE Upgraded Blackhead Vacuum Rechargeable Face Vacuum Comedone Extractor Tool for Blackhead Whitehead Acne Removal, 5 Adjustable Suction Power and 4 Porbes from Amazon. I give this product 5 BIG STARS! This thing is amazing! Myself as well as my 3 daughters all love it! We did notice early on the suction does not need to be very high to get amazing results. fyi - to see maximum results it is best to do right out of the shower when your face is clean and pores are open. A+ purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Riforgiate-Medina

customer_reviews.title: Arrive on time. But the quality is not. Attraction is not enough
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time. I'll use it right away. But I was disappointed. It doesn't work at all. I'm driving full steam ahead. I still haven't sucked anything out. Then I steamed the hot water for another 5 minutes. There's still nothing coming out. If there's a fire, I just use my hands to squeeze it. And squeezed out a lot. It seems that this style has been returned. Don't like
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: wow!
customer_reviews.text: This does the job especially if you know tips and tricks how to properly use
customer_reviews.author: Moniqua Shatifa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has crazy sting suction. However, it still doesn’t do much for really stubborn black heads. The directions included were minimal and nothing explains how it should be cleaned. Overall, it definitely did get more black and white heads than a lore strip. You definitely need to steam your face first to open up the pores.
customer_reviews.author: Snelko

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This blackhead vaccum is exactly what I was lookign for. The varying levels of suction are great for different types of skin and areas of the face. I love that the set comes with different shaped and sized heads, as well as the extractor tools. Can't be beat for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Came charged and ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong! Came charged and ready to use though, that was nice. Different attachments for whatever you want . Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Even though I watched a online video of review of this product I was extremely careful not to keep it in one place on my face I still ended up with red marks on my face like hickies, and blackheads still in place, it took 2 full days for the bruise- like mark to vanish
customer_reviews.author: Benson z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pore vacuum, and use it about two-three times a week. My skin has always been oily and I have larger pores in my T-zone. Wish I would’ve known about this kind of device years ago! Sucks out the pore gunk very effectively! As long as you read all of the directions before use you should have no problem. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Free Beck

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted something like this for awhile and when I saw how good this reviewed, I figured it was worth trying. And after using it I am so impressed! The suction level 1 was enough for my more sensitive skin but I was amazed at how much it got out so quickly. My skin is red and slightly irritated, which is normal for something like this! Usually my skin can react poorly to things like this because of how sensitive it can be but this was great! And blew my mind what it got out of my clean skin in just 5 minutes! I definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: It’s kind of fun and makes you pretty
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is pretty cool. I saw all over Facebook that R&F just came out with something like this. I didn’t want to spend an arm and a leg so tried this. It’s awesome! Only have tried the oval head so far but look forward to the others. My boyfriend has many blackheads around his nose and he was so excited to try this. It works well, comes in a nice box with instructions. I was thinking the heads would soft Instead of a hard plastic but it still works great. Excited to see the progress over time. Would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, ease of use, and suction power!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product! It was a reasonable price, easy to use, and great suction power! It is easy to adjust power for more sensitive areas and includes all the different head sizes. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product. Easy to use and to clean. It works better if the face a steamed and the pores are open. The sucction is very strong even on the lowest setting. However, the different sizes of head pieces control the suction as well. The smaller the head piece, the lower the sucction. Some bruising happened on some parts of the face where skin is more sensitive. The instructions do say not to use the product for more than 5 min and up to 3 times a week. It is helpful to read and to follow instructions sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness!! I got this product for my daughter for Christmas and she LOVES it!! After her FIRST use she could tell it was working really well. The manual that was sent along with the product helped out a ton too so I definitely recommend reading it all the way before using. Also, she was really concerned about marks left on her face after using the vacuum because she has sensitive skin in the T-area. But the product comes with a metal ball that you put on the product and it is suppose to help soothe the pores and reduce the redness. And it does!!! Definitely recommend buying this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Baker

product_meta.title: Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum Cleaner - LONOVE Upgraded Blackhead Vacuum Rechargeable Face Vacuum Comedone Extractor Tool for Blackhead Whitehead Acne Removal, 5 Adjustable Suction Power and 4 Porbes
feature_bullets: 💖 UPGRADE DESIGN IN 2019 – POWERFUL SUCTION AND RELIABLE TECHNOLOGY The LONOVE Latest Generation Blackhead Remover uses the intelligent constant force technology and air pump technology without hurting your skin. The pore vacuum suction pressure ranges from 55-100 kpa to ensure the powerful suction, which is effective to get rid of blackheads, acne and enlarged pores. Equipped with four Upgraded replaceable probes, which each serve different skin needs. ADD TO CART TO ENGOY YOUR BEAUTY.

💖 MULTI-FUNCTIONAL & PROFESSIONAL – FIVE INTENSITY LEVELS AND 4 REPLACEABLE PROBES. There are five different levels of suction intensity, which ensures that pore cleaner is suitable for all skin types. 4 replaceable probes are designed to treat a number of skin conditions, take a multi-faceted treatment approach to acne and help blemish-prone users achieve clearer, smoother skin. LONOVE blackhead vacuum provides professional-level treatments for anyone with aging or acne-prone skin.

💖 EFFECTIVE & SAFETY - Using in a correct way to remove blackheads, SAY NO TO BRUISE. With air pump technology, strong suction provided without stimulation. Before use blackhead removal tool, please use hot compress for 3-5 minutes to open the pore and use a blackhead export liquid to make the blackheads emerge to the skin surface. During treatment, please don’t let the face vacuum rest on one spot for too long, and once you’re finished, please soothe your skin by applying a frozen sheet mask.

💖 LED DISPLAY& LONG STANDBY TIME – LED TECHNOLOGE & 900 MAH LITHIUM BATTERY. LONOVE blackhead remover vacuum provides LED digital display for showing the suction level and the battery power on the screen, which is easy to operate the face blackhead remover. Quick charge with the high-capacity lithium battery. 900 mAh lithium battery can last over 150 minutes on a single charge, which enables you to take it for traveling and business trip. Ergonomic design makes it comfortable to hold and use.

💖WHY CHOOSE LONOVE – YOUR PERSONAL SKIN CARER. LONOVE electric blackhead remover is designed to be customized to a variety of skin types. Comes with EXTRA COMEDONE EXTRACTOR , Excellent customer service ensure your purchasing. NO WORRY ABOUT AFTER SERVICES. Your satisfaction is our eternal pursuit. An ideal GIFT FOR FRIENDS AND FAMILY MEMBERS.
